abstract: This is a sample solution designed for SharePoint Online which provides numerous web parts, extensions, and other components which you can use as an example and inspiration for your own customizations.

properties.name: PORTALURL
properties.caption: The main portal url
properties.description: The tenant relative url of the main site collection

properties.name: HRALIAS
properties.caption: HR site alias
properties.description: The alias for the HR O365 Group to create. The site URL will be /sites/<alias> or /teams/<alias> depending on your Tenant settings.

properties.name: MARKETINGALIAS
properties.caption: Marketing site alias
properties.description: The alias for the Marketing O365 Group to create. The site URL will be /sites/<alias> or /teams/<alias> depending on your Tenant settings.
